subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati Manager Dusty Baker, making his first managerial playoff appearance since 2003, when he was with the Cubs, isn’t thrilled with the underdog role, but he’ll take it.
snippet: Cincinnati Manager Dusty Baker, making his first managerial playoff appearance since 2003, when he was with the Cubs, isn’t thrilled with the underdog role, but he’ll take it.
